page.title: 2009 North Texas Mean Green football team

revisions.rev:
{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=2009 |Team= North Texas Mean Green |Image= UNT Lettermark.png |ImageSize= 200 |Conference= Sun Belt Conference |Division= |ShortConference= Sun Belt |CoachRank= |APRank= |Record= 2–10 |ConfRecord= 1–7 |HeadCoach=[[Todd Dodge]] |OffCoach= Todd Ford |DefCoach= [[Gary DeLoach]] |OScheme= [[Offensive philosophy (American football)#The Spread|Spread Option]] |DScheme= [[4-3]] |StadiumArena=[[Fouts Field]] |Champion= |BowlTourney= |BowlTourneyResult= }} {{2009 Sun Belt football standings}} The '''2009 North Texas Mean Green football team''' represented the [[University of North Texas]] in the [[2009 NCAA Division I FBS football season|2009]] [[college football]] season. The 2009 season was the team's third under Head Coach [[Todd Dodge]]. The Mean Green played their home games on campus at [[Fouts Field]] in [[Denton, Texas]]. North Texas finished the season 2–10 and 1–7 in [[2009 Sun Belt Conference football season|Sun Belt]] play. ==Schedule== {{CFB Schedule Start|rankyear=2008|attend=yes}} {{CFB Schedule Entry | w/l = w
